text.0: Original Article: Dasatinib–Blinatumomab in Ph-Positive ALL
text.1: Because the smoking rate among adults has fallen, and because smoking can be overshadowed by other public health issues, it’s possible to overlook the continuing toll of smoking on the United States. But smoking still kills nearly half a million Americans each year.
text.2: The NEJM Clinical Cases Resource Center aggregates interactive cases and educational resources developed specifically for teaching, continuous learning, and professional development.
text.3: The political and economic instability wrought by Covid-19, frustrations with the Affordable Care Act’s limitations, and a polarized environment in which parties are willing to legislate without bipartisan support mean that major health policy change is possible.
